data.lyric:
[ti:Lovin' On You]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Is What You Get]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lovin' On You - Luke Combs
[00:08.33]Lyrics by：Luke Combs/Thomas Archer/Ray Fulcher/James McNair
[00:16.66]Composed by：Luke Combs/Thomas Archer/Ray Fulcher/James McNair
[00:24.99]Don't get me wrong
[00:25.82]I like a bobber on the water
[00:28.36]Hookin' 'em and reelin' 'em in
[00:32.10]I like a Friday night slow ride
[00:34.70]Brooks Dunn B-side
[00:36.75]Hit rewind spin it again
[00:40.11]I like a strong shot of whiskey
[00:42.23]The way a Marlboro hits me
[00:44.49]Some broken in cowboy boots
[00:47.61]But I'm in love and lovin' on you
[00:55.77]I feel that rush soon as you walk in a room
[01:03.70]I can't get enough of you honey
[01:06.43]You're right on the money
[01:08.59]I'm a junkie for your midnight moves
[01:12.01]I'm in love and lovin' on you
[01:20.44]I like a sunrise duck blind
[01:23.10]Birdie on a par 5
[01:25.06]Miller Lite before noon
[01:28.42]I like a two-door old Ford
[01:31.11]Wood board back porch
[01:33.15]Three chords and the truth
[01:35.83]But I'm in love and lovin' on you
[01:44.02]I feel that rush soon as you walk in a room
[01:52.12]I can't get enough of you honey
[01:55.06]You're right on the money
[01:56.90]I'm a junkie for your midnight moves
[02:00.37]I'm in love with lovin' on you
[02:24.58]Girl I'm in love and lovin' on you
[02:32.38]I feel that rush soon as you walk in a room
[02:40.61]I can't get enough of you honey
[02:43.34]You're right on the money
[02:45.29]I'm a junkie for your midnight moves
[02:48.78]I'm in love and lovin' on you
[02:56.87]I'm in love and lovin' on you
data.trans:
[ti:Lovin' On You]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Is What You Get]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:08.33]//
[00:16.66]//
[00:24.99]别误会我
[00:25.82]我像漂在水上的浮标
[00:28.36]鱼儿上钩就收紧钓线
[00:32.10]我喜欢在周五夜晚驾车肆意漫游
[00:34.70]听着Brooks&Dunn乐队的唱片
[00:36.75]按下倒带健 再播放一次
[00:40.11]我喜欢倒上一杯威士忌烈酒
[00:42.23]就像万宝路带给我飘飘欲仙的感觉
[00:44.49]牛仔靴上有几处磨损
[00:47.61]可我一见倾心 深爱着你
[00:55.77]你一走进房间 我就心潮澎湃
[01:03.70]亲爱的 我怎么爱你都不嫌够
[01:06.43]你与我是天生一对
[01:08.59]午夜时分你尽情玩乐 我
[01:12.01]可我一见倾心 深爱着你
[01:20.44]我犹如日出驱散盲目无知
[01:23.10]完美无缺 无可挑剔
[01:25.06]上午喝上一杯米勒淡啤
[01:28.42]我喜欢双门老式福特车
[01:31.11]房后走廊的木地板
[01:33.15]聆听着《Three chords and the truth》这张专辑
[01:35.83]可我一见倾心 深爱着你
[01:44.02]你一走进房间 我就心潮澎湃
[01:52.12]亲爱的 我怎么爱你都不嫌够
[01:55.06]你与我是天生一对
[01:56.90]你午夜时分的舞步让我沉醉
[02:00.37]可我一见倾心 深爱着你
[02:24.58]女孩 可我一见倾心 深爱着你
[02:32.38]你一走进房间 我就心潮澎湃
[02:40.61]亲爱的 我怎么爱你都不嫌够
[02:43.34]你与我是天生一对
[02:45.29]你午夜时分的舞步让我沉醉
[02:48.78]可我一见倾心 深爱着你
[02:56.87]可我一见倾心 深爱着你
